Kvrocks å­˜å‚¨ï¼ˆæ¨èï¼‰

services:
  decotv-core:
    image: ghcr.io/decohererk/decotv:latest # æˆ–ä½¿ç”¨ :v0.4.0 å›ºå®šç‰ˆæœ¬
    container_name: decotv-core
    restart: on-failure
    ports:
      - '3000:3000'
    environment:
      - USERNAME=admin
      - PASSWORD=admin_password
      - NEXT_PUBLIC_STORAGE_TYPE=kvrocks
      - KVROCKS_URL=redis://decotv-kvrocks:6666
    networks:
      - decotv-network
    depends_on:
      - decotv-kvrocks
  decotv-kvrocks:
    image: apache/kvrocks
    container_name: decotv-kvrocks
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
      - kvrocks-data:/var/lib/kvrocks
    networks:
      - decotv-network
networks:
  decotv-network:
    driver: bridge
volumes:
  kvrocks-data:
